Reassign lead SNPs

Source: R/reassign_lead_snps.R
reassign_lead_snps.Rd

Reassign lead SNPs per group.

reassign_lead_snps(
  merged_dat,
  snp_col = "SNP",
  pval_col = "P",
  effect_col = "Effect",
  grouping_vars = c("Dataset", "Locus"),
  nThread = 1,
  verbose = TRUE
)

Arguments

merged_dat

Merged, multi-locus fine-mapping results data.

snp_col

Name of the SNP column.

pval_col

Name of the p-value column.

effect_col

Name of the Effect column.

grouping_vars

Column names to group by when assigning lead SNPs.

nThread

Number of threads to parallelise across.

verbose

Print messages.

Examples

 
merged_dat <- echodata::get_Nalls2019_merged()
#> downloading Nalls2019_merged.tsv.gz ...
#>
